titles.title: Congratulating the Valley Sports American Little League baseball team from Louisville, Kentucky, for their outstanding performance in the Little League World Series.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mrs. Davis, Jo Ann moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 516.

At the conclusion of debate, the Yeas and Nays were demanded and ordered. Pursuant to the provisions of clause 8, rule XX, the Chair announced that further proceedings on the motion would be postponed.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: (2/3 required): 344 - 0 (Roll no. 377).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/9/2002--Passed House without amendment. Congratulates the Valley Sports American Little League baseball team from Louisville, Kentucky, for their outstanding performance in winning the 2002 Little League World Series. Recognizes named team manager, coaches, and players for demonstrating excellence and character throughout a summer of little league baseball.Commends Little League Baseball for its 63-year tradition of encouraging the development of sportsmanship and confidence in youth through its sponsorship of world-class baseball.
